comment: Super great and knowledgeable in her field. The assignments were all pretty clear and there was a set due date. There is no late work accepted, but she is very accommodating. Must purchase textbook to take final exam.

(HPAL 3050)This class is not hard at all just got to do the work there is 5 discussions,7 quizzes, and 8 module assignments, last the exam which wasn't hard at all.This is one of the best teachers I have taken.He cares for his students for sure.
Make sure to complete quizzes every week but especially do the in class assignments which are graded heavier than the quiz for some reason. Overall good professor.

Prof. Scheck was an amazing online professor. The modules were open for 3 weeks at a time and you could work at your own pace. The My Health Impact project and the module quizzes were the biggest portion of your grade so take the notes from the lectures! Overall this class was super interesting and would for sure take this professor again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: Do the work and you will pass. Tests were online.

HPE3050 -  This class was difficult to deal with. She never fully explained anything. when you follow the examples she gives for assignments she tells you that you have done a lot wrong, which does not make any sense to me. I wouldn't recommend this class to anyone to take. what a horrible professor. I don't like that you can't makeup assignments
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Scheck is a great teacher. She provided lots of videos for us to watch to learn the content. It was only a 4 week course so it was a lot of work at once. The work is not hard as long as you don't wait until the last minute.

She gives you only two absences and after that you get -5 points off your overall grade at the end of the year! Little a teacher that wants you to fail! I took her class and get a 88.5 but missed four classes so she took off 10 points and made It a 78.5 literally a gpa killer! Why punish students trying to make good grades. Also very boring class!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: She only allows 2 absences before your grade gets dinged, that was the worst part. Take this class online if you can. We had so much online homework. If you come, and study some before the midterm and final you can expect an A. Keep up with the HW, it can hurt if you forget a due date. Overall, a good choice if you will show up
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Attendance mandatory. Can only miss one class. Will deduct points off of grade for missing class. Takes this class way too serious. Adds work not listed on syllabus. Which gets annoying when you have more than just this class for the semester.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: you can only miss 2 classes before she takes 5 points off your grade. will call people out for being on their phone or being tired. would not hesitate to fat shame anyone in front of the class. makes you go to the gym during class. made us run a mile around the green multiple times. do not recommend unless you like exercise

Mostly simple assignments. Web-quests, chapter questions, current events, tests, and a book report. Also had a group project where you had to make a PSA. Attendance is mandatory and if you miss an assignment when you miss a class you cant make it up, even if your absence is excused. Kind professor though and very helpful.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If you have to take wellness, TAKE IT ONLINE. Attendance is mandatory, and bear face has many glitches, so a lot isn't accessible and there are no excuses. All homework is online anyway, and only one midterm and final. The midterm was unbelievably impossible according to her study guide.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Have to go to class to receive any type of points. My class only had 2 tests, a midterm and a final. If you come to class and read the powerpoints she has online, you'll be fine. Easy A.

Great professor. You have to go to class though or she takes points off. Textbook is not needed but you will need to by the Fat Boy Chronicles book (it's only 5 dollars). The class is easy, 2 tests, 1 presentation, and a lot of in class activities.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Easiest class ever, if you fail this class than you need to check yourself. Teacher is nice, takes attendance every day. Online homework every other week, super super super ridiculously easy.

Professor Scheck is a great instructor. Her lectures are interesting and she is so kind. I'm so glad I was able to take her. Attendance affects grade but its recommended to go. Studying the PPTs alone would get me 80s on the test, so if you have time read over the textbook! Go to class before the final to review! Oh and we only had to walk not run.

Not a bad professor, but a lot of work for a required class. Tests are surprisingly hard but final exam replaces lowest test grade if needed. Lots of assignments that will earn an A if done according to directions, which will help your grade but really hurt it if you forget to do them. Lectures are kinda boring. She's nice if you treat her nicely!

She seemed to make class more difficult than it needed to be. I had friends in other classes doing less work for easy A's while I was busting it to make C's and B's. Tests were vague and hard and in class assignments must be turned in on time or you receive about 25% credit. She is difficult to reach when you need help.

She seemed to make class more difficult than it needed to be. I had friends in other classes doing less work for easy A's while I was busting it to make C's and B's. Tests were vague and hard and in class assignments must be turned in on time or you receive about 25% credit. She is difficult to reach when you need help.

Not a bad prof. Lectures are boring not going to lie. She explains everything about completing the labs. Tests were not too bad but sometimes there were things on there that was not discussed in class. There are many small assignments but it does help your grade.
She's mediocre. The work isn't hard but it's mandatory to attend class. She's kinda tough and intimidating

DON'T TAKE THIS CLASS. The work is easy, however if you miss an assignment she does not let you make it up. The tests are easy but she assigns a million small things that can affect your grade negatively. She also takes this stuff too seriously

Do not take this class. I am making a B so far, but she makes it harder than it has to be. She assigns little 5 point assignments that can really affect your grade if you forget to do them. She's boring and takes this stuff way too seriously.

Wonderful teacher, knows what she is talking about.  Class is not hard if you actually show up and pay attention.  You NEED the book, she uses it all through lecture, it's easiest to just highlight through it as she talks and then read it over before the test.  Tests are pretty easy, again just pay attention and do the work, you will get an A!

One of the worse teachers at the college. As others have suggested, makes the class much harder than it should be. Tests have some easy questions, then some which are incredibly vague and difficult. Activities seem easy, but are graded very strict. You can hand in assignments up to a week late, but beware, you will receive less than half credit !

Teacher was nice but the class is useless. Many students show only for testing and that is unfair to other sstudents and the teacher. However, no role is taken. Test is created simply over the top difficult with ridiculous questions. The students who did not attend class also had access to in class lecture ppts. Very unfair. Worst erxperience yet.

Everyone's comments are right-this class is an easy B but it takes a lot of effort to get a B.  Her study guides are different from the tests.  Just read the chapter and you'll be fine.  The tests are sooo much different from what you expect.  She knows people hate her class so she doesn't put much effort into the class.

Very easy professor but she does require more effort in her class than most other HPS profs. not hard work, just a lot of it, and she seems to have been ordained to rid the world of fat ppl. dont get her in a tangent about obesity or you'll hear nothing else. Easy B, a bit more tricky for an A. not a bad choice but take an easier prof if possible

Such an easy class if you just do the assignments. She even let people turn them in a week late. Just do them! Always responds to questions in or outside of class. Tests are harder than people expect so just STUDY! Don't just use the study guide. When I did I made a 73, but when I just read the book I made a 94.

While taking her class, I talked to other students who had already took HPS1000 from other teachers, and this teacher requires way more for her class than others do. Way too much work for a what you would think was an easy A. I got an A, but what a pain in the rear to get. There are easier teachers for HPS 1000 at KSU than this one.

EASY A! The class is fairly boring, but extremely easy. Must attend during activity days, but other than that you do not need to come. Print off study guide and READ sections in textbook that correlate to terms on guide. DO NOT MERELY MEMORIZE DEFINITIONS! Pedometer project which is easy. Final is optional and she offers 10 extra credit points.
Far too much work for a 2 hour class. Very hard grader. No flexibility!
She takes her class very seriously. I did not find it easy at all.

Changed since last year, attendance mandatory, high textbook use which you can only buy new, only 10 bonus points available, tests are EXTREMELY HARD, cumulative final (over 10 chap), if you miss class most of the labs you can't make up so you get a big fat 0, doesn't explain concepts, doesn't post powerpoints for the tests, don't go by study guide

Easy B. Her test are harder than she leads on to be, even after doing her study guide. She offers up to 20pts. of bonus, and with that its easy to make an A.Go to class for activities,turn your assignments in on time, and do a little bonus work and the A is yours!

Pretty easy. Attendance is not required. 3 tests and up to 20 bonus points for doing things outside of class such as races and classes with the wellness center. An easy B...if you do the extra credit, its an easy A

She is awesome! She let me make up an assignment after the final so I could get an A in the class. Gives study guides, the tests are hard but optional final used to replace lowest test grade. STUDY THE BOOK! Very nice lady.. extremely knowledgeable/helpful. Gives up to 20 TOTAL bonus points! I loved her, I wish she taught more classes I could take!

Very nice, easy to talk to.  Pay attention and you'll do fine.  No class is easy if you don't go....  Tests are a little difficult.  Wording is confusing. Lenient on due dates. Overall a good teacher.  Take her.

Mrs. Scheck is by far the easiest teacher i have had.  Her tests are almsot right out of the book and she gives a tudy guide to help.  She gives random extra credit if you do outside activites.  Very easy to talk to and funny.  Really is out to help out and do anything to make the experience better.  Easy A+.  Take her asap
